Detailed Description

Class for doing probe set quantification using the SEA, or Simplified Expression Analysis, method.

static SelfDoc QuantSea::explainSelf (  )  [inline, static]

Provide explanatory documentation.

Parameters are for the most part the same as those for QuantPlier and QuantIterPlier, except that here PlierFitFeatureResponse is hard coded to 0 and PlierOptOptimizationMethod is hard coded to 1.
